name: Swipe Invaders
description:
Swipe Invaders is our game entry for Ludum Dare 41.

Ludum Dare's theme was "Two Incompatible Genres", so we decided to make a space shooter blended with turn-based strategy. 

The idea is that once the space ship enters in combat you need to attack the enemies in the right order so you can successfully proceed.

Be aware that this is a Ludum Dare entry and therefore it is a prototype of an idea.

How To Play

To play you must pay attention to the order in which the enemy spaceships appear on the screen;

Then once the have the targets on them you need to swipe your finger (or use the mouse) to draw the line that matches the sequence that they appeared in.

The enemies usually appear from the left of the screen to the right.

Watch out for the timer as well.

Have fun, and rate us on the Ludum Dare page :)

Thanks.

Sound Track by Alexandr Zhelanov, https://soundcloud.com/alexandr-zhelanov

Downloaded from https://opengameart.org/content/mystical-theme

We made everything else.

Tech that we used:

Blender - 3D Models

Illustrator - 2D Graphics / UI

Unity - Game Engine

Audacity / BFXR - Create SFX
